        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "All About Food";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>

 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.
   </div>

     $(document).ready(function () {
            $('#iview').show();

                pauseTime: 6000,
                directionNav: false,
                fx: "fade",
                    tooltipY: -15,
                    timer: "Bar",
                    pauseOnHover: "false",
                    controlNav: "true"
                });
            });
    </script>

    </noscript>
    <div id="iview" style="width:940px; height:247px;">

   <div id="subs-container">
    <div class="top-corners">
     <div class="tr-corner">
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="main-corners">
     <div class="column-66 float-left">
      <div id="tcm1703-53156">
       <div id="sustContainer">
        <h1>
         <div style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          All About Food
         </div>
        </h1>
        <div>
         <p>
          <span style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
           <span style="font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-size: 9pt;">
            At Muhlenberg, we talk the talk and walk the walk. All of our food is served at the peak of freshness with our menus based on the seasonality and availability of fresh, locally grown products. We only partner with sustainability minded, ethical vendors. 
           </span>
          </span>
         </p>
         <p>
          <span style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
           <span style="font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-size: 9pt;">
            <br />
           </span>
          </span>
         </p>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          Farmers Market Fall 2016
         </h2>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <img title="Farmers_Market_F16_2" alt="Farmers_Market_F16_2" style="float: right; width: 275px; height: 183px;" src="/Images/farmers_market_f16_web2_tcm1703-121850.jpg" />
         </h2>
         <div>
          <font color="#006000">
           <span style="font-size: 12px;">
            On September 15th from 11AM to 4PM, Muhlenberg College hosted its Fall 2016 Farmers Market on the College Green. The market was organized by Muhlenberg College’s Environmental Action Team (EnAcT) and sponsored by Muhlenberg Dining. This was the second Farmers Market organized by EnAcT and the organization hopes to bring the market to school once a semester. Seven farms from the Lehigh Valley (BAD Farms, Bleilers Produce Patch, Crooked Row Farm, Knee High Farm, Red Cat Farm, Ridge Valley Farm, and Schocarie Ridge Apiary) visited campus, offering a variety of products and produce including honey, tea, maple syrup, smoothies, kombucha, vegetables and more. EnAcT organized the market in order to support local farmers, as well as to educate the Muhlenberg Community on the importance of eating locally.
           </span>
          </font>
         </div>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <img title="New Component" alt="New Component" style="float: right; width: 125px; height: 104px;" src="/Images/Common_Market_SMW_tcm1703-96289.jpg" />
          Common Market - Philadelphia
         </h2>
         <span style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-size: 9pt;">
          <span style="font-family: Verdana;">
           In the spring of 2015, Muhlenberg received its first delivery from
           <a href="http://commonmarketphila.org/" target="_blank">
            Common Market
           </a>
           , a Philadelphia based food 
          </span>
          <span style="font-family: Verdana;">
           distributor
          </span>
          <span style="font-family: Verdana;">
            that connects wholesale customers to farmers in New Jersey, Pennsylvania and Delaware.
           <a href="http://commonmarketphila.org/" target="_blank">
            Common Market
           </a>
           sources local produce, meat and dairy offerings from Lehigh, Bucks and Berks counties. By sourcing our food locally, Muhlenberg Dining reduces transportation expenses and our environmental footprint. We are excited about this new partnership because it means even more local produce available at all of the dining locations on campus.
          </span>
         </span>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <strong>
           Lancaster Farm Fresh Cooperative 
          </strong>
         </h2>
         <span style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 9pt;">
          <img title="landinglogo" alt="landinglogo" style="float: right; width: 125px; height: 115px;" class="logos" src="/Images/landinglogo_tcm1703-53158.png" />
          In Summer 2013, we embarked on a mission to further expand our procurement of local produce. Thanks to the tireless efforts of several individuals, led by Muhlenberg’s Executive Chefs, a new partnership was born with
          <a href="http://www.lancasterfarmfresh.com/" target="_blank">
           Lancaster Farm Fresh Cooperative
          </a>
          . 
          <br />
          <a href="http://www.lancasterfarmfresh.com/" target="_blank">
           LFFC
          </a>
          is a non-profit, organic farmers' cooperative of 75 farmers in Lancaster County, Pennsylvania (approximately 70 miles from Muhlenberg). Each week LFFC delivers a fresh bounty of produce, most of which is picked the day prior to delivery. 
         </span>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <br />
         </h2>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <strong>
           CSA with Kneehigh Farm
           <img title="Knee High Logo" alt="Knee High Logo" style="float: right; width: 150px; height: 122px;" src="/Images/knee_high_logo_tcm1703-112897.jpg" />
          </strong>
         </h2>
         <span style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <span style="font-family: Verdana; font-weight: normal; font-size: 9pt;">
           Beginning in Spring 2015, Muhlenberg College partnered with Kneehigh Farm to offer membership to the farm's Community Supported Agriculture, or CSA. By joining the CSA, members directly support the local farm's operation and gain access to fresh, seasonal and organically grown produce.  For more information about Kneehigh Farm or its CSA, please visit their
           <a href="http://www.kneehighfarm.com/">
            website
           </a>
           .
          </span>
          <br />
         </span>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); text-align: left;">
           
         </p>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          Local Sourcing 
         </h2>
         <span style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 9pt;">
          Are you curious as to where your food is coming from? Check out our interactive map that highlights our local farms, bakeries, apiaries and distributors. 
         </span>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <iframe src="https://www.google.com/maps/d/embed?mid=zzPy_TEbrpDw.ke7MLfiokEjo&amp;hl=en" width="640" height="480">
           Your browser does not support frames. Please go to https://www.google.com/maps to view this map.
          </iframe>
         </p>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          View
          <a href="https://www.google.com/maps/d/viewer?ll=40.195659,-75.498047&amp;t=m&amp;source=embed&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;msa=0&amp;spn=2.014015,3.515625&amp;z=8&amp;hl=en&amp;mid=zzPy_TEbrpDw.ke7MLfiokEjo" target="_blank">
           MUHLENBERG DINING LOCAL VENDORS
          </a>
          in a larger map. 
         </p>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          Butter Valley Harvest Hydroponically Grown Basil 
         </h2>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 9pt;">
          <img title="BVH logo" alt="BVH logo" style="float: right; width: 125px; height: 75px;" class="logos" src="/Images/BVH_tcm1703-53159.png" />
          Located in Bally, PA, just 15 miles from Muhlenberg College,
          <a href="http://www.buttervalleyharvest.com/" target="_blank">
           Butter Valley Harvest
          </a>
          is our exclusive provider of fresh, hydroponically grown basil. In August 2013, our culinary team visited the farm to learn more about the basil growing process. For an inside look at Butter Valley Harvest, please check out this 
          <a href="http://youtu.be/Ve2vGa_mW_M" target="_blank">
           video
          </a>
          . 
         </p>
         <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ve2vGa_mW_M" frameborder="0" style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          Your browser does not support frames. Please go to http://youtube.com to view this video.
         </iframe>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          Monterey Bay Aquarium Seafood Watch Guidelines 
         </h2>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 9pt;">
          <img title="SeafoodWatchLogo" alt="SeafoodWatchLogo" style="float: right; width: 125px; height: 135px;" class="logos" src="/Images/SeafoodWatchLogoPadded_tcm1703-53160.png" />
          Muhlenberg Dining is committed supporting the
          <a href="http://www.seafoodwatch.org/" target="_blank">
           Seafood Watch guidelines
          </a>
          outlined by the Monteray Bay Aquarium. The Seafood Watch program “helps consumers and businesses make choices for healthy oceans.” Following their guidelines, we are helping to make an impact on our future and our customers’ future. 
         </p>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          Fair Trade Coffee 
         </h2>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 9pt;">
          <img title="fair trade logo" alt="fair trade logo" style="float: right; width: 125px; height: 171px;" class="logos" src="/Images/transfairlogo_tcm1703-53161.png" />
          We only offer Fair Trade certified coffee on campus. Whether you’re grabbing a quick pick-me-up at Java Joe or enjoying an after-dinner cup of coffee at a catered event, all of our brands (
          <a href="http://www.starbucks.com/responsibility" target="_blank">
           Starbucks
          </a>
          ,
          <a href="http://www.seattlesbestfs.com/Company/Page/About_Us" target="_blank">
           Seattle’s Best
          </a>
          and
          <a href="http://www.peets.com/subscriptions.html?gclid=Cj0KEQiAlae1BRCU2qaz2__t9IIBEiQAKRGDVWWiWRg991KcwjWRPeW0TKnPKvc4mLGB3ly4DXFejh8aAkye8P8HAQ">
           Peet's Coffee
          </a>
          ) meet agreed environmental, labor and developmental standards set forth by
          <a href="http://www.fairtradeusa.org/" target="_blank">
           Fair Trade USA
          </a>
          .
         </p>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 9pt;">
           
         </p>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <br />
         </p>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <img title="Sustain_13" alt="Sustain_13" style="width: 939px; height: 433px;" src="/Images/Sustainable_Living_tcm1703-112383.jpg" />
          <br />
         </p>
         <p style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <br />
         </p>
         <h2 style="color: rgb(0, 96, 0);">
          <br />
         </h2>
         <div>
          <font color="#006000">
           <span style="font-size: 12px;">
            <br />
           </span>
          </font>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <script type="text/javascript" src="https://images.sodexomyway.com/js/catering-lto.js">
       </script>
       <div class="lto" data-keyword="">
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="column-33 float-right">
